actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 5:00 p.m. on November 5, 2024.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. Timothy A R Cole (QHC), Christ Church, Georgetown, Washington DC
The Speaker designated the Honorable Alexander X. Mooney to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
